function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficiently described green space exposure measurement, leading to potential inaccuracies in the assessment of its impact on contagious diseases.","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of green space impact on contagious diseases, hindering effective mitigation efforts.","Mitigation":"Provide sufficient description of green space exposure measurement to ensure accurate assessment.","Technologies":"Remote sensing technology for objective green space measurement.","People":"Researchers, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate representativeness of study samples, leading to biased conclusions regarding the impact of green space on contagious diseases.","Impact":"Biased conclusions affecting the implementation of effective mitigation strategies related to green space.","Mitigation":"Conduct rigorous sampling to ensure representativeness of study samples.","Technologies":"Sampling and data collection technologies for diverse and representative samples.","People":"Researchers, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of valid and reliable tools for assessing participant outcomes related to green space exposure and contagious diseases.","Impact":"Unreliable assessment of outcomes may lead to inaccurate conclusions about the impact of green space on contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Use validated and reliable tools for outcome assessment to ensure accurate conclusions.","Technologies":"Validated assessment tools and data collection technologies.","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
